author: Cliff Moore
comment: After reviewing this app again. I've found it has made a very clean and revamp of a classic game from the late 70's to 80's. One we all know and love. The redesign for my moto 360 had been done very well and looks very clean. Anyone who wants a game to play on there smartwatch should at least give this app a chance. There are a few bugs here and there. But no app is without them.

reply.author: Schlawinsky
reply.content:
Update:
Hello Cliff,
thank you a lot for taking the time reviewing smartsays again and providing feedback.
Hopefully you enjoy our app and feel yourself entertained.


Hello Cliff,
thank you for this feedback. This is definitely unsatisfying. We´re working on this issue and provide a improvement, soon.

title: Fun and creative

comment: It turns a screen on you watch which is weird, it doesn't fits screen, it's slow and unusable
title: Poor port

comment: It's a good time killer game. You will love it.
title: It will kill your time.

comment: I enjoyed it a lot. Highly recommended for my friends.
title: It's challenging game!

author: rahin mash
comment: One of the best app for my Android wear. Very cool to use.
title: Just Great

author: Pratik Thapa
comment: It's definitely a good brain exercise game.
title: I'm performing well in this game.

author: Marufa Mahbub
comment: It will measure your cleverness. 5 stars for it.
title: Great game for brain workout.

author: Sarah Tasnim
comment: It's a simple game and easy to use. Love it.
title: Simple game.

author: GPM PANDAVAZZ
comment: Its working pretty good with the Android wear.The design of the app is very good and attractive.The app test your intelligence very well.It has a huge diversity in levels so everyone can use it.Whether you are damn clever or just want to spend some time to get rid of the frustration.It acts like a stressbuster to me.Good job team!
title: Works well,enjoying it

author: christian wilson
comment: Works well on my smart watch. It's good for when I get bored or for just wasting time.
title: Fun

author: Zoran M
comment: Can you only log in via Farcebook or Twatter? If so, make it clear in the blurb.
title: Waste of time.

author: Daniel Arce Rodriguez
comment: Turns 90° on watch and doesn't displays good. It works, but doesn't looks good.

reply.author: Schlawinsky
reply.content:
Hi Daniel, thanks for your feedback. While made for Moto 360, we are working on a version for other watches.
Thanks!

comment: Cool little game for on my Moto 360! It works like a charm, the game is fun to play when I'm waiting for my bus in the morning
title: Awesome

comment: I haven't faced any trouble with it and it looks perfect. Thanks.
title: It's working perfect on my device!

comment: I don't like social networking. So in order to use I need Facebook?!...

reply.author: Schlawinsky
reply.content:
Hello David,
atm we are fixing this issue. There will be an
add and social network free version online this week.
